Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Aspartylglucosaminuria ( AGU ) is a rare disorder of glycoprotein metabolism caused by the deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase ( AGA ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU) - This is a disease, specifically a rare disorder of glycoprotein metabolism.
2. The deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA) - This is also considered a "disease" or disorder because it's the cause of Aspartylglucosaminuria. It's a deficiency, which is a type of disease or disorder.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

1. Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU)
2. The deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA) - Although this is a deficiency and not a disease itself, it is directly related to the disease Aspartylglucosaminuria, so it can be included as a disease entity in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

|---------------|
| Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU) |
| The deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA) |
